properties.areaDesc: Butler, KY; Muhlenberg, KY; Ohio, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 5 at 9:43AM EST by NWS Louisville KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...

Green River at Rochester

affecting the following counties in Kentucky...Butler...Muhlenberg...
Ohio.

.Continued rainfall over the next few days will cause the river to rise.

The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Green River at Rochester.
* until further notice.
* At  8:00 AM Wednesday the stage was 16.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 17.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late this morning and continue
to rise to near 21.4 feet by Saturday morning.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.4
feet on Feb 1 2009.
properties.instruction:
If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions.
Additional information is available at
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lmk.
